ul.li: GStreamer 0.8. If you use GStreamer, you will need decoder plugins (e.g. mad for MP3 support).

body.p: There are no official binary packages of Rhythmbox. Supporting binary versions for many different operating systems is too difficult, so we don't even try. However some users have created binary packages, and the Rhythmbox project provides links to them here for your convenience. The existence of a link on this page should not necessarily be considered an endorsement.

dd.p: Specially instrumented RPMs are available from the Cooperative Bug Isolation Project. These builds send feedback that may help us find and fix bugs even faster.
binary and source RPMs of Rhythmbox created Dag Wieers are in his APT repository.
Debian packages are available in the main Debian unstable archive.
